Chalice - Class in logic
The Chalice is the object, which the player has to get to.
Chalice(Point2D.Double, GameMap) - Constructor for class logic.Chalice

Collidable - Interface in logic
All class which implements this interface is able to collide with one another.
collided - Variable in class logic.Entity
The actors which this entity was colliding since this moment.
collided - Variable in class logic.Tile
Only for testing purposes.
collideExit(Entity) - Method in interface logic.Collidable
On collision exit, some class invokes this method to interact with the entity collided.
collideExit(Entity) - Method in class logic.EmptyTile
This is usually used in testing to check if collided something or not.
collideExit(Entity) - Method in class logic.GroundTile
Using this for testing, just seeing if the tile is colliding.
collideWith(Player) - Method in class logic.Chalice
If the player is colliding with this actor, then the player won the game.
collideWith(Entity) - Method in interface logic.Collidable
If collision occurs, this method is called on the object whose class implements this interface.

collideWith(Player) - Method in interface logic.Collidable

collideWith(Entity) - Method in class logic.EmptyTile
Checks if the tile under this tile is an empty tile, if yes, and the entity is fully in this tile, then the entity is not grounded.

Redirecting to the proper collide method.
collideWith(Player) - Method in class logic.EmptyTile

collideWith(PistolBullet) - Method in class logic.Enemy
If hit with a pistol bullet, the bullet deals damage to the enemy and disappears.
collideWith(PistolBullet) - Method in class logic.GroundTile

Redirecting to the collision with the entity.

Colliding with an enemy, resulting in the enemy damaging the player.
